results.title: The Chicago 7 Trial Onscreen: An Interpretation for Every Era
results.abstract: Aaron Sorkin is only the latest filmmaker to dramatize this prime example of political theater. Each version has a different understanding of the case and what it means.

results.title: How Much Do You Really Miss Going to the Movies?
results.abstract: Amid concerns about the future of theaters, remember that the past wasn’t always glorious. This is the moment to rethink what we want at a cinema.
The creative forces behind the new movie “American Utopia” were in search of a sense of connection and community even before the pandemic.

results.abstract: There are few big-budget contenders and the ceremony may be reduced, but the list of nominees could be more diverse than ever.
